info.name: MojaloopSims_Onboarding
info.description:
Author: Sridevi Miriyala
Purpose: Used to add new FSP and relevant Callback Information. 
In this collection we onboarded HUB accounts for the corresponding currency, payerfsp, payeefsp, testfsp1, testfsp2 sims.
